first_para: Gregory Lloyd Campbell (born 15 February 1953) is a Northern Ireland unionist politician, and the Democratic Unionist Party (DUP) Member of Parliament for East Londonderry.

full.extract:
Gregory Lloyd Campbell (born 15 February 1953) is a Northern Ireland unionist politician, and the Democratic Unionist Party (DUP) Member of Parliament for East Londonderry.
^ http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/members/minister.htm
^ http://www.publications.parliament.uk/pa/cm/cmregmem/110124/part2.htm
full.title: Gregory Campbell (politician)
